title: Clean / Bright & Spacious 1 Bed / 1 Bath Home in a Great Area!
posting_body: This prime Bluff Park apartment is a spacious 1 bedroom 1 bath apartment that is located in a beautiful garden setting, serene and quiet.

The apartment features refinished hardwood, new tile floors and upgraded counters in the bath and kitchen, new designer paint, beautiful trims, vertical blinds, ceiling fan in bedroom and new recessed lighting in the living room with ample closet space.
The kitchen has lots of charm with new counter tops and backsplash and is furnished with a refrigerator and stove and dishwasher.
Additionally, for your convenience there are laundry facilities, a community BBQ and bike rack onsite.
